snp-vcf.title: Small variant VCF
snp-vcf.description: VCF file with small variant calls (SNPs and indels) for the sample. These will be unphased.

snp-gvcf.title: Small variant GVCF
snp-gvcf.description: GVCF file with the SNPs for the sample. These will be unphased.

snp-vcf-joint.title: Joint Small variant VCF
snp-vcf-joint.description: Joint VCF file with Small variant calls (SNPs and indels).

sv-vcf.title: Structural variant VCF
sv-vcf.description: VCF file with the SVs for the sample. These will be phased if SNP is enabled.

sv-vcf-joint.title: Joint structural variant VCF
sv-vcf-joint.description: VCF file with the SVs for all the samples.

sv-snf.title: Structural variant SNF
sv-snf.description: SNF file with the SVs for the sample, for onward SV merging.

haplotagged-alignment.title: Haplotagged alignment file
haplotagged-alignment.description: BAM file with the haplotagged reads for the sample. Will be pedigree phased if phased option is used.

haplotagged-alignment-index.title: Haplotagged alignment file index
haplotagged-alignment-index.description: The index of the resulting BAM file with the haplotagged reads for the sample.

RTG_snp.title: RTG Annotation SNP
RTG_snp.description: RTG mendelian inheritance report from SNP VCF.

RTG_sv.title: RTG Annotation SV
RTG_sv.description: RTG mendelian inheritance report from SV VCF.

pedigree_file.title: Pedigree file
pedigree_file.description: The pedigree file filtered by family_id.

Trio-small-variants-report.title: Trio small variants report
Trio-small-variants-report.description: Analysis and stats relating to the multi-sample small variants VCF.

Trio-sv-report.title: Trio SV report
Trio-sv-report.description: Analysis and stats relating to the multi-sample SV VCF.

individual-sv-report.title: Individual SV report
individual-sv-report.description: Analysis and stats relating to the SVs for each individual.

individual-small-variants-report.title: Individual small variants report
individual-small-variants-report.description: Analysis and stats relating to the small variants for each individual.

individual-qc-report.title: Individual QC report
individual-qc-report.description: Quality control read stats including read length and quality scores.
